named-query.name: Participant.getAll
named-query.query: from Participant p where p.cancelled = false

named-query.name: Participant.getBySin
named-query.query: from Participant p where p.sin = :sin and p.cancelled = false

named-query.name: Participant.countBySinAndNotSelf
named-query.query: select count(p) from Participant p where p.sin = :sin and p.cancelled = false and p != :self

named-query.name: User.getByUserName
named-query.query: from User u where u.username = :username and u.cancelled = false

named-query.name: User.countByUserName
named-query.query: select count(u) from User u where u.username = :username and u.cancelled = false
